div.p: From the family of Baron Cristoforo Negri
RB MSS M200a.22, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

MS is a printed invitation, addressed to 'Monsieur Ferdinand De Mueller Barone e Console d'Italia Melbourne (Australia)'. To this, someone, presumably a postal official, has added 'St Kilda'. Attached to the invitation is a two-page handwritten chronology, in English, of Negri's career, and his card: "Il Barone Cristoforo Negri/ Senatore del Regno/ Ministro di Stato/ Firenze — 10, Via Leonardo da Vinci/ Villa d'Istria".
Carlotta Gatti vedova Negri, Cav. Ingegner Luigi Negri, Antonio Moscioni Negri, Deputato al Parlamento, Giuseppina e Giulio Cesare Moscioni Negri compresi da vivo dolore compiono il penoso ufficio di partecipare alla S. V. la istantanea morte del rispettivo loro Cognato, Zio, Suocero e Nonno

Ministro di Stato e Senatore del Regno, Presidente fondatore della Società Geografica Italiana, Membro onorario delle principali Società Geografiche d'Europa e d'America e delle principali Accademie scientifiche italiane ed estere, avvenuta oggi alle ore 13,50' per paralisi cardiaca.

N.B. Il trasporto della Salma sara fatto Venerdi 21 corrente alle ore 16, dalla Casa d'abitazione, Via Leonardo da Vinci, 10, alla Misericordia, di dove proseguira alla Stazione ferroviaria per Torino col treno Via Genova N. 72, per essere tumulata nella Cappella gentilizia.

Carlotta Gatti widow Negri, engineer Sir Luigi Negri, Antonio Moscioni Negri, Member of Parliament, Guiseppina and Giulio Cesare Moscioni Negri joined in deep sorrow have the painful duty of announcing to you the sudden death of, respectively, their brother-in-law, uncle, father-in-law and grandfather

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center; font-variant: small-caps;

div.p: Minister of State and Senator of the Kingdom, founding President of the Italian Geographical Society, honorary Member of the principal Geographical Societies of Europe and America and of the principal Italian and foreign scientific Academies, which happened today at 1.50 pm through cardiac arrest.

N.B.The transporting of the body will take place on Friday 21st of the current [month] at 4 pm, from the place of residence, Via Leonardo da Vinci, 10, to the Misericordia,
A charitable institution in Florence that was also in charge of the transfer of dead persons. from where it will continue to the railway station for Turin by train via Genova No. 72, to be interred in the family chapel.
